page.description: The layout of the Ink Control has several options. The "split" option will divide the Ink Control into an edit and view area. The "editor" option will show only the edit area. The "detached view" will show the Ink view in the element with the specified ID.

figure.title: The 'editor' option. This editor has no overlay.
